analysis.current_status: Multi-app educational platform with typing, math, reading, piano. Needs bug fixes and architecture improvements

milestones.name: Critical Architecture & Database Fixes
milestones.description: Fix blocking issues with routing, database schemas, and template serving

tasks.title: Fix template serving without string-munging
tasks.description: Render templates via blueprints with correct static_url_path/url_for instead of rewriting HTML
tasks.technical_notes: Affects all apps - unified_app.py line handling

tasks.title: Fix dashboard template/static resolution
tasks.description: Ensure dashboard consistently loads from dashboard_templates/ with /dashboard_static paths

tasks.title: Align central DB schema initialization
tasks.description: Reconcile education_central.db initialization between unified_app.py and dashboard.py

tasks.title: Unify typing persistence schema
tasks.description: Standardize typing/typing.db schema across typing/app.py and unified_app.py

tasks.title: Align math schema and field naming
tasks.description: Reconcile math/math_practice.db schema and fix mode vs operation field naming

tasks.title: Fix piano API mounting
tasks.description: Mount /piano/api/* on unified blueprint and anchor piano.db to module directory

tasks.title: Fix reading API blueprint registration
tasks.description: Move /reading/api/* endpoints to unified server blueprint

milestones.name: Database & Session Management
milestones.description: Fix database path anchoring and session handling

tasks.title: Anchor all DB paths to module directories
tasks.description: Fix all apps to use Path(__file__).parent for DB paths to avoid stray files

tasks.title: Fix math session defaulting
tasks.description: Replace hard-coded user_id = 1 with guest user lookup/creation

tasks.title: Investigate math save_session 500 errors
tasks.description: Add validation and error logging for /math/api/save_session payload issues

tasks.title: Create/fix math questions detail table
tasks.description: Align questions table structure between unified_app.py expectations and app schema

tasks.title: Add reading users table
tasks.description: Create users table in reading app DB for dashboard sync compatibility

milestones.name: Configuration & Security
milestones.description: Replace hardcoded config with environment variables and improve security

tasks.title: Replace hard-coded hosts/ports with env config
tasks.description: Move 100.112.58.92 and other hard-coded values to environment variables

tasks.title: Clarify HTTPS cert handling
tasks.description: Make cert.pem/key.pem optional with graceful fallback and clear documentation

tasks.title: Centralize Flask secret keys
tasks.description: Move all secret keys to environment variables across all apps

tasks.title: Document sandbox port error workaround
tasks.description: Investigate [Errno 1] Operation not permitted and document solution

milestones.name: Analytics & Authentication
milestones.description: Centralize analytics and implement Google OAuth

tasks.title: Centralize analytics ingest
tasks.description: Write summarized metrics to education_central.db when apps save results

tasks.title: Propagate authenticated users across apps
tasks.description: Sync Google OAuth users to all per-app DBs with shared session cookie

tasks.title: Implement persistent user identity
tasks.description: Replace random secrets with unified session management for consistent user tracking

tasks.title: Build user profile/progress view
tasks.description: Create unified profile showing stats across all apps from central DB

milestones.name: App-Specific Enhancements
milestones.description: Improve individual app features and data storage

tasks.title: Store math question/answer details normalized
tasks.description: Normalize question storage and add remediation suggestions for missed fact families

tasks.title: Add reading per-word accuracy tracking
tasks.description: Store expected vs recognized words in separate table for detailed analytics

tasks.title: Implement piano per-note timing capture
tasks.description: Track per-note timing and mistakes in first-class table for analytics

tasks.title: Add typing guided practice plans
tasks.description: Create accuracy-first then speed drill plans with milestone badges

tasks.title: Build math adaptive practice modes
tasks.description: Implement spaced repetition and mixed-operations challenges

tasks.title: Create reading skill progression system
tasks.description: Build progression: isolated words → phrases → sentences → passages

tasks.title: Add piano practice playlists
tasks.description: Create left/right/both hand drill playlists with progress tracking

tasks.title: Create Playwright E2E test suite
tasks.description: Build E2E tests for critical user flows across all apps

tasks.title: Add cross-browser compatibility tests
tasks.description: Test on Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge for desktop and mobile

tasks.title: Implement API integration tests
tasks.description: Test API endpoint chains and error handling across all apps

tasks.title: Harden process launcher
tasks.description: Add stdout/stderr logging, health polling, and crash recovery to app_launcher.py

tasks.title: Finalize requirements.txt and Makefile
tasks.description: Pin dependencies, add make dev/run targets, document Python version

tasks.title: Setup GitHub Actions CI/CD
tasks.description: Configure automated test runs on PR with coverage reporting

tasks.title: Create deployment smoke tests
tasks.description: Build smoke test script that validates deployment health

technical_risks: Database migration complexity across 4 app DBs + central DB
Session management changes could break existing user sessions
Template refactoring could introduce rendering bugs
resource_risks: Large codebase (7784 lines) increases testing burden
mitigation_strategies: Create backup of all DBs before schema changes
Implement feature flags for gradual rollout
Test in DEV environment before QA deployment
